question: Anything that occupies !sspace!e and has !smass!e is called !smatter!e.
On the basis of !sphysical!e properties !smatter!e is classified as !ssolids!e, !sliquids!e and !sgases!e.
On the basis of !schemical!e properties, !smatter!e is classified as !selements!e, !scompounds!e and !smixture!e.
The particles which make up !smatter!e are !satoms!e or !smolecules!e.
